description.@en: Steel balls begin to rotate in unison around your body, shielding you from harm.

criticalFailure.@en: The steel balls knock the Wind out of you. You immediately suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] physical Peril.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can Dodge ranged attacks and Parry melee attacks using your Incantation Skill.

reagents.@en: A handful of small steel balls
